ValidationRule.description: Order Number Field must contain the Order Number if Sales Stage is closed/Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
And(
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed/Won"), ISBLANK( RPON_Order__c ), Pricebook2.Name = "Standard Price Book", NOT ISPICKVAL( System_the_Order_Entered_In__c , "Sterling"), NOT ISPICKVAL( System_the_Order_Entered_In__c , "Salesforce"), (RecordType.Name != "Carrier Service") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Order Number must contain a value if Sales Stage is Closed/Won.... If this is a Salesforce or Sterling Order, Please select SALESFORCE or STERLING For: System the Order # Entered From
